content: **free pattern hooded scarf | a cozy and modern knit** discover the joy of knitting with this free tutorial for a stylish and functional hooded scarf perfect for beginners and seasoned knitters alike this project creates a unique accessory that combines the warmth of a scarf with the cozy coverage of a hood ✨ pattern highlights skill level beginner versatile design a seamless all-in-one hood and scarf customizable easily adjust the length for a perfect personal fit simple & meditative knit entirely in stockinette stitch all knit stitches making it a perfect on-the-go or relaxing project project details yarn approximately 180 grams of any yarn or mix with a gauge of ~200 meters per 100 grams needles 4 mm gauge 15 stitches & 30 row = 10 cm in stockinette stitch what you ll learn/make this tutorial guides you through the simple process of creating the hooded scarf from a single cast-on point you ll practice working in stockinette stitch increasing and decreasing to shape the hood creating a symmetrical design with a custom-fit slope perfect for knitters looking for a quick satisfying gift beginners wanting to practice shaping techniques anyone who loves cozy handmade accessories download your free tutorial now and knit up this wonderfully cozy essential
